headline: HEWLETT PACKARD MODULAR DC SOURCE MONITOR
description: Modular DC Source Monitor      The HP 4142B has a wide measurement range with high resolution and excellent sensitivity. A user-definable system component, allows you to build a custom configuration to suit your measurement needs.  Modules included are (3) HP 41421B and (1) Agilent 41420A.
categories.lvl1: Test & Measurement Equipment > Other Test & Measurement
specstable:
Manufacturer Hewlett Packard
Model 4142B
Description Source Monitor, DC, Modular
Interface IEEE 488-GPIB
Accessories

Cards Installed

  • (1) Agilent 41420A Source Monitor, 40µV-200µV, 20fA-1A
  • (3) HP 41421B Source Monitor, 40µV-100µV, 20fA-100mA
Power Requirements 120/240 V 50/60 Hz
CE Marked YES
Exterior Dimensions
Width 17.000 in (43.2 cm)
Depth 25.500 in (64.8 cm)
Height 8.750 in (22.2 cm)
